org.robobrain.sdk.game
Class Entity

java.lang.Object
  org.robobrain.sdk.game.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
World
public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object

The base game Entity class. Derive all of your game objects from this class. Things like the player, enemies, bullets, etc.

Author:
James Johnson

Field Detail

vx

public float vx
The Entity's velocity along the X axis.

vy

public float vy
The Entity's velocity along the Y axis.

dx

public float dx
The Entity's heading (direction, facing) along the X axis.

dy

public float dy
The Entity's heading (direction, facing) along the Y axis.

mRenderable

protected Renderable mRenderable
The Entity's internal Renderable object. Usually a Sprite.

mSpeed

protected float mSpeed
The Entity's speed. Used to calculate velocity.

mFriction

protected float mFriction
The amount of friction to apply to the Entity each frame.

Constructor Detail

Entity

public Entity()
Method Detail

update

public void update(long time)
Updates the Entity and performs physics calculations, AI, etc. Called once per frame.

Parameters:
time - The amount of time elapsed since the last frame.

onCollision

public void onCollision(Entity sender)
Called when the Entity collides with another Entity.

Parameters:
sender - The Entity this one has collided with.

onBounds

public void onBounds(int width,
                     int height)
Called when the Entity has gone off screen.

Parameters:
width - The width of the screen in pixels.
height - The height of the screen in pixels.

setX

public void setX(float x)
Sets the Entity's position along the X axis.

Parameters:
x - The Entity's position along the X axis.

getX

public float getX()
Gets the Entity's position along the X axis.

Parameters:
x - The Entity's position along the X axis.

setY

public void setY(float y)
Sets the Entity's position along the Y axis.

Parameters:
y - The Entity's position along the Y axis.

getY

public float getY()
Gets the Entity's position along the Y axis.

Parameters:
y - The Entity's position along the Y axis.

getWidth

public int getWidth()
Gets the Entity's width.

Returns:
The Entity's width in pixels.

getHeight

public int getHeight()
Gets the Entity's height.

Returns:
The Entity's height in pixels.

getRotation

public float getRotation()
Gets the angle the Entity has been rotated.

Returns:
The angle of rotation. 0 = none, 360 = completely turned around.

setRotation

public void setRotation(float angle)
Rotates the Entity to a specific angle.

Parameters:
angle - The angle of rotation. 0 = none, 360 = completely turned around.

getScale

public float getScale()
Gets the Entity's scale.

Returns:
The amount the Entity has been scaled. 1 = normal size.

setScale

public void setScale(float angle)
Scales the Entity.

Parameters:
angle - The amount to scale the Entity by. 1 = normal size.

getSpeed

public float getSpeed()
Gets the Entity's speed. Multiply this by its direction and the amount time elapsed in one frame to calculate the Entity's velocity.

Returns:
The Entity's speed.

getRect

public Rectangle getRect()
Gets the Entity's bounding Rectangle.

Returns:
The Entity's bounding Rectangle.

getRenderable

public Renderable getRenderable()
Gets the Renderable object used to represent the Entity. Usually a Sprite.

Returns:
The Renderable object used to represent the Entity.

draw

public void draw(GL10 gl)
Draws the Entity's Renderable to the screen.

Parameters:
gl - A valid OpenGL ES 1.0 object.
